title: Trouble with FL4.6 Font Index
content:
Pardon me if this has been asked about, search is useless. This is FL 4.6...

I've got a completed font that I'd like to generate. Both names and unicode numbers are right. But, when I view the font in index mode, the glyphs are all in the wrong position, and this shows when viewing the font in the glyphs window in Adobe Illustrator.

How do I get the index corrected?
author: matthew_desmond

comments.content:
[http://www.typophile.com/node/67230](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019231043/http:/www.typophile.com/node/67230 "http://www.typophile.com/node/67230")

In index mode you can drag and drop them where you want, I think.

Never mind. Brought it into FL5 and sorted by unicode in the glyph menu and that fixed it. Ugh. At least I didn't have to sort them by hand. Now I get to go back and fix all of the fonts I didn't realize were screwed.
